query.statement: SELECT QTNUM , GUBN , GUBN_2 , MATNR_1 , MATNR_NM , SPEC , ZSIZE , QUALT , MENGE , MEINS , BDMNG , LOSS , NETPR , WAERS , PROG_NM , EQUIP , BIGO , '' AS FLAG , '' AS CHECK , MENGE AS TOT_MENGE , (MENGE*NETPR) AS TOT_NETPR FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT145 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CHAR(QTNUM) = #QTNUM# AND GUBN = '2' FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
